cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okuru

sentence.kanji: 彼の家に荷物を送りました。
sentence.romaji: kare no ie ni nimotsu wo okurimashita
sentence.english: I sent a package to his house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miokuri

sentence.kanji: 駅に友人の見送りに行きました。
sentence.romaji: eki ni yuujin no miokuri ni ikimashita
sentence.english: I went to the station to see off a friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miokuru

sentence.kanji: 彼が外国に行くのを見送りました。
sentence.romaji: kare ga gaikoku ni iku no wo miokurimashita
sentence.english: I saw him off on his trip overseas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansuru

sentence.kanji: その問題に関する記事を読みました。
sentence.romaji: sono mondai ni kansuru kiji wo yomimashita
sentence.english: I read an article about the problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanren

sentence.kanji: 関連のセクションへ連絡した。
sentence.romaji: kanren no sekushon he renraku shita
sentence.english: I contacted the related sections.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kankei

sentence.kanji: 彼はその事件に関係がない。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono jiken ni kankei ga nai
sentence.english: He has nothing to do with that incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishin

sentence.kanji: 日本は地震が多いです。
sentence.romaji: nihon ha jishin ga ooi desu
sentence.english: Earthquakes are frequent in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furueru

sentence.kanji: 彼は寒くて震えていました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha samukute furuete imashita
sentence.english: He was cold and shivering.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nougyou

sentence.kanji: 私は農業を勉強しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nougyou wo benkyou shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm studying agriculture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koi

sentence.kanji: 私は濃い味が好きだ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha koi aji ga suki da
sentence.english: I like strong tastes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saku

sentence.kanji: 桜の花が咲きました。
sentence.romaji: sakura no hana ga sakimashita
sentence.english: The cherry blossoms have bloomed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's housou

sentence.kanji: その番組は来週放送されます。
sentence.romaji: sono bangumi ha raishuu housou saremasu
sentence.english: The program will be broadcast next week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okurigana

sentence.kanji: その送り仮名は間違っています。
sentence.romaji: sono okurigana ha machigate imasu
sentence.english: That kana suffix is wrong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furu

sentence.kanji: 犬がしっぽを振っている。
sentence.romaji: inu ga shipo wo fute iru
sentence.english: The dog is wagging its tail.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genkan

sentence.kanji: 玄関に花を飾りました。
sentence.romaji: genkan ni hana wo kazarimashita
sentence.english: I decorated the entrance with flowers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jama

sentence.kanji: 邪魔です、どいてください。
sentence.romaji: jama desu doite kudasai
sentence.english: You're in the way, so please move.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soukin

sentence.kanji: 取引先への送金を済ませました。
sentence.romaji: torihikisaki he no soukin wo sumasemashita
sentence.english: I completed the money transfer to our client.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuusou

sentence.kanji: 書類を郵送してください。
sentence.romaji: shorui wo yuusou shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please mail the documents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soubetsukai

sentence.kanji: 来週、課長の送別会を開きます。
sentence.romaji: raishuu kachou no soubetsukai wo hirakimasu
sentence.english: The section chief's farewell party will be held next week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikan

sentence.kanji: 台風で交通機関がストップしている。
sentence.romaji: taifuu de koutsuu kikan ga sutopu shite iru
sentence.english: Transportation has stopped because of the typhoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanshin

sentence.kanji: 彼は政治に関心が強いね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha seiji ni kanshin ga tsuyoi ne
sentence.english: He has a strong interest in politics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukanshin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は政治に無関心です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha seiji ni mukanshin desu
sentence.english: She's indifferent to politics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansetsu

sentence.kanji: 手首の関節をひねっちゃった。
sentence.romaji: tekubi no kansetsu wo hinechata
sentence.english: I have twisted my wrist joint.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unsou

sentence.kanji: 彼は運送会社に勤めているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha unsou gaisha ni tsutomete iru no
sentence.english: He works for a transportation company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukankei

sentence.kanji: 彼はこの事件と無関係です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kono jiken to mukankei desu
sentence.english: He has nothing to do with this incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shindo

sentence.kanji: 今朝の地震は震度3でしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kesa no jishin ha shindo san deshita yo
sentence.english: The earthquake this morning had a seismic intensity of three.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furi

sentence.kanji: 彼はバットの振りが大きすぎる。
sentence.romaji: kare ha bato no furi ga ooki sugiru
sentence.english: He swings the bat too wide.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yusou

sentence.kanji: この商品はトラックで輸送します。
sentence.romaji: kono shouhin ha toraku de yusou shimasu
sentence.english: These goods are transported by truck.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noumin

sentence.kanji: 中世の農民は貧しかった。
sentence.romaji: chuusei no noumin ha mazushikata
sentence.english: The farmers in the Middle Ages were poor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nouka

sentence.kanji: 彼は農家に生まれました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nouka ni umaremashita
sentence.english: He was born into a farming family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nouson

sentence.kanji: 私は農村で育ちました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nouson de sodachimashita
sentence.english: I grew up in a farming village.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miburi

sentence.kanji: 彼は身振りを交えて説明してくれたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha miburi wo majiete setsumei shite kureta no
sentence.english: He explained it to me while gesturing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soubetsu

sentence.kanji: 送別の辞は誰に頼みましょうか。
sentence.romaji: soubetsu no ji ha dare ni tanomimashou ka
sentence.english: Whom shall we ask to give a farewell speech?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furigana

sentence.kanji: 名前に振り仮名をつけてください。
sentence.romaji: namae ni furigana wo tsukete kudasai
sentence.english: Please indicate the pronunciation of your name with kana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enzetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は地方で演説したのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chihou de enzetsu shita no yo
sentence.english: He made a speech in the provinces.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouen

sentence.kanji: 彼らの海外公演が発表されたよ。
sentence.romaji: karera no kaigaikouen ga hapyou sareta yo
sentence.english: Their overseas performances were announced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shutsuen

sentence.kanji: 彼女はその映画に出演しているよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha sono eiga ni shutsuen shite iru yo
sentence.english: She is performing in the movie.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's engeki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は演劇を学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha engeki wo manande imasu
sentence.english: She studies acting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouen

sentence.kanji: 彼の講演は評判がいい。
sentence.romaji: kare no kouen ha hyouban ga ii
sentence.english: His lectures have a good reputation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakawaru

sentence.kanji: 医師は人の命に関わる大切な職業だよ。
sentence.romaji: ishi ha hito no inochi ni kakawaru taisetsu na shokugyou da yo
sentence.english: A doctor's job is very important, as people's lives depend on it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shindou

sentence.kanji: 車の振動で棚の荷物が落ちた。
sentence.romaji: kuruma no shindou de tana no nimotsu ga ochita 。
sentence.english: Vibration from a passing car caused things on the shelf to fall down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zeikan

sentence.kanji: 毛皮を税関で没収されたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kegawa wo zeikan de boshuu sareta n da
sentence.english: The fur was seized at customs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuchibiru

sentence.kanji: 寒くて唇が青くなってしまった。
sentence.romaji: samuku te kuchibiru ga aoku nate shimata
sentence.english: My lips are blue with cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninshin

sentence.kanji: 彼女が妊娠したそうです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ga ninshin shita sou desu
sentence.english: I hear that she's pregnant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furimuku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は振り向いて俺に微笑んだんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha furimuite ore ni hohoenda n da
sentence.english: She turned around and smiled at me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furikaeru

sentence.kanji: 学生時代を懐かしく振り返ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: gakusei jidai wo natsukashiku furikaeta n da
sentence.english: I looked back fondly on my school days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miryoku

sentence.kanji: 彼女の明るさに魅力を感じました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no akarusa ni miryoku wo kanjimashita
sentence.english: I was charmed by her cheerfulness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katamari

sentence.kanji: 道に土の塊ができてたよ。
sentence.romaji: michi ni tsuchi no katamari ga dekiteta yo
sentence.english: A clump of earth had formed on the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minikui

sentence.kanji: 醜い争いはやめましょう。
sentence.romaji: minikui arasoi ha yamemashou
sentence.english: Let's stop an ugly fight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enjiru

sentence.kanji: 彼はよく刑事の役を演じるね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yoku keiji no yaku wo enjiru ne
sentence.english: He often performs the role of a detective.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jama

sentence.kanji: 邪魔です、どいてください。
sentence.romaji: jama desu doite kudasai
sentence.english: You're in the way, so please move.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ensou

sentence.kanji: 彼女のピアノの演奏は素晴らしいね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no piano no ensou ha subarashii ne
sentence.english: Her piano performance is wonderful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osou

sentence.kanji: 山で登山客が熊に襲われたよ。
sentence.romaji: yama de tozan kyaku ga kuma ni osowareta yo
sentence.english: Some climbers were attacked by a bear in the mountains.
